feed.title: FitTrackee Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for FitTrackee: v0.10.0
entry.content:
In addition to a new language and translation updates, this version brings asynchronous archives upload, support for several file formats and heart rate and cadence display.

2 environment variables are also added: TASKS_TIME_LIMIT and STATICMAP_CACHE_DIR (see documentation).

[!NOTE] This version also includes the changes from the beta versions.

Features and enhancements

  • #87 - Prevent gpx parse error with zip import
  • #89 - Asynchronous archives upload
  • #122 - Allow to upload Fit file
  • #143 - KML/KMZ support
  • #194 - Rewrite workout file processing [1st part]
  • #529 - Support import TCX file
  • #642 - Support Heartrate and cadence
  • PR#801 - Display file source in workout data

Bugs Fixed

Fix on v0.10.0b2: * 9f05417 - fix radio label on workout form * d46ba03 - store archive in upload directory * 3827067 - fix original file storage

Translations

  • PR#804 - Translations update (Russian)
  • #805 - [translations request] Catalan
  • PR#808 - Translations update (Catalan, Russian)
  • PR#813 - Translations update (Translation files cleanup)

Translation status: - Basque: 92% - Bulgarian: 57% - Catalan: 25% - Chinese (Simplified): 92% - Croatian: 91% - Czech: 42% - Dutch: 92% - English: 100% - French: 100% - Galician: 92% - German: 91% - Italian: 47% - Norwegian Bokmål: 30% - Polish: 92% - Portuguese: 56% - Russian: 91% - Spanish: 59%

Thanks to the contributors: - @ArnyminerZ - @Lemetist

[!NOTE] If you upgrade from the v0.9.x, there are migrations to apply (see upgrade instructions in documentation)

entry.title: New release for FitTrackee: v0.10.1
entry.content:

entry.title: New release for FitTrackee: v0.10.2
entry.content:
Bugs Fixed

  • #823 - Unable to upload GPX files when cadence value is a float
  • PR#827 - Fix hr and cadence values when gpx points contain multiple values in extensions

Translations

entry.title: New release for FitTrackee: v0.10.3
entry.content:
Features and enhancements

  • PR#837 - Update Garmin products mapping
  • #838 - New sport: Standup paddleboarding
  • #839 - Segments creation depending on pause events

Translations

  • PR#828 - Translations update from Hosted Weblate (Croatian)

  • PR#836 - Translations update from Hosted Weblate (Galician and Turkish)
  • PR#842 - Translations update from Hosted Weblate (Croatian and Galician)

Translation status: - Basque: 91% - Bulgarian: 57% - Catalan: 25% - Chinese (Simplified): 99% - Croatian: 100% - Czech: 45% - Dutch: 99% - English: 100% - French: 100% - Galician: 100% - German: 90% - Italian: 47% - Norwegian Bokmål: 30% - Polish: 91% - Portuguese: 56% - Russian: 93% - Spanish: 59% - Turkish: 1%

Thanks to the contributors: - @BorATICI - @iggydev - @jmlich - @sikmir - @xmgz

[!NOTE] This release contains database migration (see upgrade instructions in documentation)

entry.title: New release for FitTrackee: v0.11.0
entry.content:
This release brings a new sport (Outdoor Tennis), power support for bike-related workouts, new display for workout chart, Garmin device mapping update and several fixes and translation updates.

[!WARNING] - This release contains database migrations (see upgrade instructions in documentation) - The minimum Node version (for development) is now Node 20.

Features and enhancements

  • #792 - add support for power
  • #859 - New sport: Tennis (Outdoor) Tennis activity
  • PR#861 - Add Garmin Edge Explore 2 device
  • PR#872 - Update Garmin products mapping
  • PR#874 - Add ability to display multiple charts in workout detail

Bugs Fixed

  • #853 - docker-compose-dev doesn't work in MacOS because of port issue
  • #856 - URL link malformed in comments section
  • PR#857 - fix app config init to prevent multiple rows creation
  • #864 - Improve handling of out-of-order frames in .fit file (and stop_all bugfix)
  • #868 - No tiles displayed at max zoom
  • PR#876 - Fix statistics chart for ascent/descent when last sport's value is null
  • 7cc3606 - get product name only when manufacturer is Garmin
  • fbdad3f - fix y-axis when workout has no elevation
  • 1d6f48c - fix heart rate label on chart
  • 7f7a225 - fix a11y issues on map control buttons

Translations

  • PR#845 - Translations update from Hosted Weblate (Galician)
  • PR#849 - Translations update from Hosted Weblate (French)
  • PR#851 - Translations update from Hosted Weblate (German)
  • PR#858 - Translations update from Hosted Weblate (German and Turkish)
  • PR#862 - Translations update from Hosted Weblate (Spanish)
  • PR#865 - Translations update from Hosted Weblate (Galician)
  • PR#866 - Translations update from Hosted Weblate (Spanish)
  • PR#870 - Translations update from Hosted Weblate (Russian)
  • PR#873 - Translations update from Hosted Weblate (Galician and Russian)
  • PR#878 - Translations update from Hosted Weblate (Galician)

Translation status: - Basque: 90% - Bulgarian: 56% - Catalan: 25% - Chinese (Simplified): 97% - Croatian: 98% - Czech: 44% - Dutch: 98% - English: 100% - French: 100% - Galician: 100% - German: 93% - Italian: 46% - Norwegian Bokmål: 30% - Polish: 90% - Portuguese: 55% - Russian: 99% - Spanish: 74% - Turkish: 1%

Misc

  • PR#863 - Update docker-compose-dev.yml
  • ff38d0c - CI - update node version to 20.x
  • d81afd5 - CI - add workflow to check docker images build

Thanks to the contributors: - @BorATICI - @juanro49 - @leafcompost - @Thovi98 - @Unargent - @Vertux - @xmgz - mrab - Nikita Epifanov
